name: html
description: To improve the source code of tsumego hero so: - The page can be moved to a modern server with php 8.4 functionality - The code is better structured, readable and easily modifiable. - The functionality of the site is fully covered by automated tests, so it doesn't just "randomly break" - Current test coverage status can be checked here: https://kovarex.github.io/tsumego-hero/coverage/
